Description: Dish. Fish. Made of relief and turquoise glazed pottery.
Bibliographic references: Hobson 1932b / A Guide to the Islamic Pottery of the Near East (fig.77)
Exhibition history: 2019 15 Jul-15 Oct, Beijing, Palace Museum, Longquan of the World 2019-2020 10 Nov-10 Feb, Hangzhou, Zhejiang Provincial Museum, Longquan of the World
